---
title: "SPP for ALLHC"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
ALLHC <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/ALLHC.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
allhc <- ts(ALLHC[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+37/365.25)
allhc %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(allhc))
```

```{r}
training_allhc <- subset(allhc, end=length(allhc)-3)
test_allhc <- subset(allhc, start=length(allhc)-2)
fc_training_allhc<-forecast(training_allhc)
fc_training_allhc %>%
  forecast(h=10) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_allhc)
```

```{r}
fc_training_allhc
```

```{r}
fc_allhc<-forecast(allhc)
fc_allhc %>%
forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_allhc
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_allhc)
```

```{r}
tail(allhc)
min(allhc)
max(allhc)
which.min(allhc)
```
